messages.content: tell me 5 ideas for a youtube video about less known windows features
1) Windows 10 Dark Mode 2) Windows 10 Themes 3) Windows 10 Sticky Notes 4) Windows 10 Snipping Tool 5) Windows 10 Task View
I need the 5 features and a little description.

1) Dark mode is a feature in Windows 10 that converts light elements of the interface to a dark theme. 2) Themes allow you to customize the look and feel of the Windows 10 operating system. 3) Sticky Notes is a digital post-it note app that lets you create and take notes on your desktop. 4) The snipping tool is a screen capture tool included with Windows that lets you capture any part of your screen and save it as an image file. 5) Task View is a new feature in Windows 10 that lets you see all of your open windows and virtual desktops at once.
